text: Uppalapati Venkata Krishnam Raju (20 January 1940 â€“ 11 September 2022) was an Indian actor and politician. He was born in Mogalthur, then-British India. He was a member of the Lok Sabha from 1998 until 2004 as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. His first acting role was in the 1966 movie Chilaka Gorinka. Raju died on 11 September 2022 in Hyderabad, India from problems caused by pneumonia while recovering from COVID-19 at the age of 82.Veteran actor and former union minister Krishnam Raju dies at 83 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Hyderabad Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Krishnam Raju
